cards.name: Rey
cards.bio: A resilient survivor, scavenger, and emerging Jedi with a mysterious past.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Rey with her staff on the deserts of Jakku, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Finn
cards.bio: A defected stormtrooper with a conscience, seeking to escape his past.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Finn holding a blaster, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Poe Dameron
cards.bio: The best pilot in the Resistance, charismatic and daring.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Poe Dameron in his pilot gear, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Han Solo
cards.bio: The legendary smuggler, back in action against the First Order.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Han Solo with his blaster, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Chewbacca
cards.bio: The loyal Wookiee warrior and co-pilot of the Millennium Falcon.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Chewbacca roaring with his bowcaster, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Leia Organa
cards.bio: The General of the Resistance and a symbol of hope.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Leia Organa in her Resistance uniform, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: BB-8
cards.bio: A spherical astromech droid, brave and full of heart.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: BB-8 rolling in the desert, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: C-3PO
cards.bio: The protocol droid fluent in over six million forms of communication.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: C-3PO with his red arm, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: R2-D2
cards.bio: The astromech droid, a hero of the Rebellion and the Resistance.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: R2-D2 projecting a hologram, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Maz Kanata
cards.bio: An ancient and wise alien with a knack for sensing the Force.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Maz Kanata with her goggles, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style

cards.name: Kylo Ren
cards.bio: The dark warrior, leader of the Knights of Ren and servant of Supreme Leader Snoke.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Kylo Ren with his crossguard lightsaber, Star Wars: The Force Awakens style
